mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qa_board ( NUM ,CATEGORY ,WRITER ,SUBJECT ,CONTENT ,REG_DATE ,ADP_YN ,DEL_YN ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(num), 0) + 1 FROM qa_board ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY) , #{category} , #{writer} , #{subject} , #{content} , (SELECT date_format(now(),'%Y-%c-%d')) , 'N' , 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT NUM ,CATEGORY ,WRITER ,SUBJECT ,CONTENT ,REG_DATE ,UPD_DATE ,ADP_YN ,DEL_YN ,PARENT_NUM FROM qa_board WHERE NUM=#{num}
mapper.delete: UPDATE qa_board SET DEL_YN = 'Y' , UPD_DATE = (SELECT date_format(now(),'%Y-%c-%d')) WHERE num = #{num}
